title: 4 things people who are good with money do every day
text:
Being good with money is nothing more than being thoughtful and deliberate about how you spend, save, earn, and invest.

People who are good with money have clear goals and make decisions every day that bring them closer to achieving them.

Further, they're patient and consistent, adept at balancing "wants" and "needs," and actively avoid temptation.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

People who are good with money have to work at it every day.

Like exercise or eating healthy, managing your money is never finished. You can reach your goal weight or ideal net worth, but there are daily behaviors required to maintain that status.

Here are a few things people who are good with money do every day:
description: Being good with money means you're thoughtful and deliberate about the way you spend, save, invest, and earn.
